title: 'collections.OrderedDict' object has no attribute 'fc'
body_html:
hello, everyone！
I am a pytorch newer. I try to load a pre-trained model:

 model_ft = torch.load("resnet34-333f7ec4.pth")  
 num_ftrs = model_ft.fc.in_features

but it occured an error:

'collections.OrderedDict' object has no attribute 'fc'

how to load a pre-trained model?(without load_url method, the pretrained model is in current path)
any help appreciated!
body_text:
hello, everyone！
I am a pytorch newer. I try to load a pre-trained model:
 model_ft = torch.load("resnet34-333f7ec4.pth")

but it occured an error:

how to load a pre-trained model?(without load_url method, the pretrained model is in current path)
any help appreciated!
body:
hello, everyone！
I am a pytorch newer. I try to load a pre-trained model:

```
 model_ft = torch.load("resnet34-333f7ec4.pth")  
 num_ftrs = model_ft.fc.in_features
```

but it occured an error:

 'collections.OrderedDict' object has no attribute 'fc'

how to load a pre-trained model?(without load_url method, the pretrained model is in current path)
any help appreciated!
